entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make FontImageSourceExtension inherit from BindableObject #8850
  • [BUG] Published executable file fails to start in Windows #8847
  • HRESULT E_FAIL with Rectangle with margin and no stroke #8846
  • Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #8845
  • WinUI targets require location permissions set in manifest when asking for location #8842
  • TranslationY does not work on Frame component #8840
  • Assertion failure #8835
  • Flyout items can vanish when arrowing down through a flyout #8834
  • MT1008: Failed to launch the simulator: Value cannot be null. #8833
  • Intent filter throws an exception in maui #8832
  • Android Resource file is not included in the app build #8831
  • Run Maui MSI on window server 2019 not working. #8830
  • MAUI Workload version vs .Net SDK version #8828
  • Minimize/Maximize/Close button on the right corner of header of window is not working #8827
  • [BUG] FontImageSource will not use Color of Parent Button #8826
  • Make IProvideParentValues public #8825
  • XAML Extensions ServiceProvider should have access to the Scoped ServiceProvider #8824
  • Separate Window Management from IApplication #8823

Closed

  • Enabling CheckBox does not change visual state #6727
    6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Setting the background color on entry changes the underline color as well #6207
    6.0-servicing
  • Entry decoration on Android not correct. #8067
    6.0-sr3
  • OnPlatform with Thickness breaks XAML Hot Reload #6619
    6.0-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [xamlc] add compiled StrokeShapeTypeConverter #8849
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [xamlc] add compiled ImageSourceConverter #8843
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add AppThemeColor #8839

Merged

  • [xamlc] add compiled BrushTypeConverter #8567
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Set Window Parent before initialize the child ContentPage #8653
    t/bug, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr4
  • [Housekeeping] Fix net6.0 branch build #8829
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen for Net6 #8797
    area/single project ☝️, partner/tizen
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22329.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22368.2 #8822
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Controls.Core] Handle Null Values for AdaptiveTrigger #7267
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0-servicing

Updated

  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to children #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix crash on Picker with null and fix up handler to not use INCC #8407
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-picker, 6.0-sr3
  • Add Obsolete attribute to MessagingCenter #8765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7
  • [Windows] Fix issue updating Entry Text without taking into account MaxLength #8674
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr4
  • [Android] Avoid to create the Shadow bitmap if is not neccesary (memory consumption) #8817
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix issue using Entry IsPassword with IsReadOnly property #8344
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Update Border StrokeTickness even if StrokeShape is null #8520
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/ui-tools
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix readonly Editor with multiple lines #8014
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Pending changes to correctly updating WinUI properties via resources #8193
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix crash using animations and changing View sizes (negative values) #8273
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, fatal
  • [Windows] Fix wrong RadialGradient on Border #8408
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • [iOS] Fix Shadow rendering on iOS Border #8464
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Changed default Border StrokeShape value #8521
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Invalidate Path if something in a PathFigure or PathGeometry changes #8533
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, .NET 7
  • Fix CheckBox's VisualStates #8605
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Fix Entry placeholder position using VerticalTextAlignment #8684
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr4
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix Border Background not changed to Brush once we set the Gradient #7926
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix crash using Slider using Mac UIDeviceFamily #8757
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, fatal, control-slider
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [build] make sure toolbox images are embedded #8806
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Uncomment Editor TextChanges Test #6930
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-servicing
